text: the antibacterial soap antibacterial
wipes just antibacterial anything you
should probably just stop using it
panty bacterial soap works by killing a
wide range of bacteria but FDA research
shows that this could contribute to the
formation of superbugs germs that are
resistant to modern forms of antibiotic
treatment antibacterial products usually
contain an agent called triclosan when
you use this type of soap
the only thing that survives is
antibiotic resistant bacteria this
resistance is then passed on create a
new generations of untreatable germs the
World Health Organization says these
resistant microbes have emerged in every
corner of the world and the CDC says
that 23,000 people die a year from
antibiotic resistant infections but
that's not all
triclosan is such a powerful agent that
it can get past water treatment plants
and into clean water streams and it's
one of the most frequently detected
contaminants in u.s. streams when
triclosan filled wastewater is
discharged into streams it reacts
photochemically and creates a toxin
called dioxin dioxins vary in their
toxicity as they come from a family of
219 chemicals while scientists are still
studying the effects of dioxins formed
from triclosan many such chemicals are
harmful at high levels according to the
World Health Organization dioxins are
highly toxic and can cause reproductive
and development problems damage the
immune system interfere with hormones
and also cause cancer dioxins then
infect the food chain with us at the top
more than 90% of human exposure is
through food according to the World
Health Organization
in addition to all of this antibacterial
soap has not been shown to be any better
than traditional soap a study showed
that triclosan was only more effective
after nine hours of exposure when most
people only spent seconds scrubbing
their hands though many antibacterial
soaps have been replacing triclosan with
other chemicals like benzene thorium
chloride but at the end of the day
you're probably just better off sticking
with traditional so
